message: Let's split close to 50/50, but slightly in your favor, Bob.  This considers the decreasing value over time and gives us a fair deal right now.
Alice, your offer was a good starting point.  However, to account for the money's decreasing value for me, I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.  This offer is fair considering the time pressure.

Bob, I understand the time pressure is on you more than me, but I need a reasonable deal too. This offer is a good compromise - it's closer to my initial offer, acknowledging the decreasing value you face.
